title: 我最主要就係想指一高登分裂的最大原因

replies.msg:
當然管理層和營運團隊都有一定的責任，但我認為最大的問題是反高登的那幫人，我上連登上看到，他們日日都在評擊高登，是高登分裂的關鍵！如果不喜歡高登的話，就請支持其他論壇，為什麼日日都想希望高登分裂？高登這兩周的人流大幅下滑，都是因為那班反高登的7頭日日在咀咒高登，而最不幸的是，竟然連個天都幫埋佢地，搞到高登咁少人。

唉！我明白有批評才有進步，但現在的高登，真的很需要連登仔的支持，才能重震雄風！請停止對高登的批評或咀咒，並刪除其有關的帖子及網站！高登最近人流下滑最要主原因是反高登人士不斷的干擾，如果他們的不停止反高登行動的話，那就消滅他們吧！只有這樣做才可以令高登做番一個人氣論壇！

唔係
係曼聯其中一個球迷會facebook專頁
入面有人出既文


There Premiership history marked the first time the king Dimaliya armored Manchester United, on Saturday night guest 0: 0 stuffy and Burnley, who have lost two points. After the game, the team leader of cloud Gore (Louis van Gaal) made ​​the analysis, pointed out numerous reasons for Manchester United.

"I think the most important on the line refers to a Manchester United losing the biggest reason, of course, the players and coaching staff have some responsibility, but I think the biggest problem is the anti-gang Man, I see on the social networking site, they criticize day in Manchester, is the key to Manchester United lose waves! if Manchester United do not like it, please support other teams, why want to hope that Manchester United lost day wave? "cloud Gore bewildered.

"Manchester United have fallen sharply this autumn results, because that class anti Mann's seven day curse Manchester United lost in the wave, and most unfortunately, not even one day have helped bury canal, the Manchester United got hit Link difference. "cloud Gore continued.

When asked about the future of the tactical team countermeasures, cloud Gore called on fans to support the team Manchester United: "I understand the criticism, there is progress, but now Manchester United, really need the support of the fans of each team, in order to re-shock glory! Please stop criticism of Manchester United or curse, and close their relevant special page and website! Manchester United scores the most to the main reason for the decline is the anti-Man who constantly interfere, and if they do not stop the anti-Man action, it would destroy them ! only by doing so can the English Premier League team Manchester United made ​​a Fan BIG 4! "

似係支那啲玻璃文

https://zh-tw.facebook.com/fucmanu/posts/609066932526898

我最主要就係想指一曼聯輸波的最大原因，當然球員和教練都有一定的責任，但我認為最大的問題是反曼的那幫人，我上社交網站上看到，他們日日都在評擊曼聯，是曼聯輸波的關鍵！如果不喜歡曼聯的話，就請支持其他球隊，為什麼日日都想希望曼聯輸波？曼聯這兩季的成績大幅下滑，都是因為那班反曼的7頭日日在咀咒曼聯輸波，而最不幸的是，竟然連個天都幫埋佢地，搞到曼聯打到咁差。
唉！我明白有批評才有進步，但現在的曼聯，真的很需要各隊球迷的支持，才能重震雄風！請停止對曼聯的批評或咀咒，並關閉其有關的專頁和網站！曼聯成績下滑最要主原因是反曼人士不斷的干擾，如果他們的不停止反曼行動的話，那就消滅他們吧！只有這樣做才可以令曼聯做番一隊英超BIG 4！
